Description: Kakarot is Goku's birth name, given by his Saiyan parents. He was sent to Earth as a baby to conquer it, but a head injury made him forget his mission and he grew up as the kind-hearted Goku.
Question: What is the main protagonist's Saiyan name?

Description: Goku (Son Goku) was named by his adoptive grandfather Gohan after he found the baby in the mountains. The name is inspired by Sun Wukong, the Monkey King from 'Journey to the West.'
Question: What is Goku's Earth name?

Description: Vegeta is the prince of the fallen Saiyan race. His father, King Vegeta, ruled Planet Vegeta before Frieza destroyed it. Vegeta's pride stems from his royal heritage.
Question: Who is the Prince of all Saiyans?

Description: Gohan was named after Goku's adoptive grandfather. He's a half-Saiyan with immense latent power, first shown when he broke Raditz's armor as a child. He becomes a scholar as an adult.
Question: What is the name of Goku's oldest son?

Description: Goten is born after the Cell Saga and strongly resembles young Goku. He achieves Super Saiyan at an extremely young age, possibly due to being conceived while Goku was in Super Saiyan form.
Question: What is the name of Goku's youngest son?

Description: Trunks is Vegeta and Bulma's son. Future Trunks travels back in time to warn the Z Fighters about the Androids. Present Trunks grows up alongside Goten as his best friend.
Question: Who is Vegeta's son?

Description: Krillin (Kuririn) trained alongside Goku under Master Roshi. Despite being human, he's one of the strongest Earthlings. He eventually marries Android 18 and has a daughter, Marron.
Question: Who is Goku's lifelong best friend and fellow martial artist?

Description: Master Roshi (Muten Roshi) is the legendary martial artist who invented the Kamehameha. He trained Goku, Krillin, and many others. Grandpa Gohan originally found and raised baby Goku.
Question: Who trained Goku as a child?

Description: Master Roshi is called the 'Turtle Hermit' (Kame Sennin) because he lives with a talking turtle and founded the Turtle School of martial arts. His rival is the Crane Hermit.
Question: What is Master Roshi's other name?

Description: Piccolo is the reincarnation of King Piccolo. When he fused with Kami (his good half), he became whole again. Kami was Earth's guardian before separating from his evil side.
Question: Who is the Namekian who fused with Kami?

Description: Dende became Earth's guardian after Kami fused with Piccolo. The young Namekian from Planet Namek has strong healing abilities and upgraded Earth's Dragon Balls to grant two wishes.
Question: Who is the guardian of Earth after Kami?

Description: Bardock is a low-class Saiyan warrior who gained the ability to see the future. He tried to stop Frieza from destroying Planet Vegeta but failed. He's Goku's biological father.
Question: What is the name of Goku's father?

Description: Chi-Chi is the daughter of the Ox-King. She and Goku met as children when she was still a princess. Despite being a capable fighter, she prioritizes Gohan's education over fighting.
Question: Who is Goku's wife?

Description: Bulma is a genius scientist and heiress to Capsule Corporation. She invented the Dragon Radar and has been part of the adventure since the original Dragon Ball series.
Question: Who is Vegeta's wife?

Description: Dr. Brief founded Capsule Corporation and invented capsule technology. He's Bulma's father and a brilliant but eccentric scientist who keeps small animals as pets.
Question: Who is the founder of Capsule Corporation?

Description: Frieza is an intergalactic tyrant who destroyed Planet Vegeta out of fear of the Super Saiyan legend. His species is naturally extremely powerful, making him a feared emperor.
Question: Who is the emperor of the universe that destroyed Planet Vegeta?

Description: Cell is a bio-android containing cells from Goku, Vegeta, Piccolo, Frieza, and King Cold. He was designed by Dr. Gero to be the ultimate lifeform and absorbs Androids 17 and 18 to reach perfection.
Question: What is the name of the bio-android created by Dr. Gero?

Description: Majin Buu is an ancient magical creature created by the wizard Bibidi. The original Kid Buu is pure evil, but the fat Buu form is created by absorbing the kind Grand Supreme Kai.
Question: What is the name of the pink majin villain?

Description: King Cold is Frieza's father and rules alongside his family as universal overlords. He's defeated quickly by Future Trunks when he arrives on Earth with Mecha Frieza.
Question: Who is Frieza's father?

Description: Raditz is Goku's older brother who arrives on Earth expecting Kakarot to have conquered the planet. His appearance reveals Goku's Saiyan origins and kicks off Dragon Ball Z.
Question: Who is the first villain Goku faces in DBZ?

Description: Raditz is Goku's biological brother, making him Bardock's son. Despite this, Goku teams up with Piccolo to defeat him, as Raditz threatens to destroy Earth.
Question: What is the relationship between Raditz and Goku?

Description: Cell must absorb both Android 17 and Android 18 to achieve his Perfect Form. He has imperfect and semi-perfect forms before this, each progressively stronger.
Question: What is Cell's 'Perfect' form achieved by absorbing?

Description: Dr. Gero was a Red Ribbon Army scientist who created the Androids to get revenge on Goku for destroying the army. He turned himself into Android 20 to survive.
Question: Who created the Androids and Cell?

Description: Dr. Gero converted himself into Android 20 to achieve immortality. However, he's destroyed by Android 17, whom he couldn't fully control despite programming him to hate Goku.
Question: What is Dr. Gero's Android designation?

Description: Babidi is the son of Bibidi, who originally created Majin Buu. Babidi uses mind control magic (the 'Majin' mark on the forehead) to control powerful beings like Dabura and Vegeta.
Question: Who is the wizard that released Majin Buu?

Description: The Kamehameha was invented by Master Roshi, who spent 50 years perfecting it. Goku learned it almost instantly by watching Roshi use it. The name means 'Turtle Devastation Wave.'
Question: What is Goku's signature energy attack?

Description: Vegeta's signature moves include Galick Gun (similar to Kamehameha), Final Flash (his most powerful attack), and Big Bang Attack. These showcase Saiyan pride over borrowing others' techniques.
Question: What is Vegeta's signature attack?

Description: Instant Transmission (Shunkan Ido) was taught to Goku by the Yardrats after he escaped Planet Namek. It requires sensing someone's ki to teleport to their location.
Question: What technique allows instant travel by focusing on a person's energy?

Description: The Spirit Bomb (Genki Dama) gathers energy from living things to create a massive sphere of pure life force. Only those pure of heart can use it effectively.
Question: What technique gathers energy from all living things?

Description: The Special Beam Cannon (Makankosappo) is a drilling energy attack that took Piccolo years to develop. It was first used to kill Raditz, also killing Goku in the process.
Question: What is Piccolo's signature piercing attack?

Description: The Destructo Disc (Kienzan) is a razor-sharp energy disc that can cut through almost anything. Despite its power, Krillin often misses his targets with it.
Question: What is Krillin's signature disc attack?

Description: The Tri-Beam (Kikoho) is so powerful it drains the user's life force, not just ki. Tien used it to hold Cell back, sacrificing his body to protect others.
Question: What is Tien's most powerful but self-damaging attack?

Description: The Fusion Dance was taught by the Metamoran race. Participants must match power levels and perform perfect mirror movements. A failed fusion creates a weak, fat version called Veku.
Question: What technique allows two people to fuse into one being using a dance?

Description: Potara Earrings are worn by Supreme Kais. When two people each wear one earring, they fuse permanently (though this was later retconned to be temporary for non-Kais).
Question: What items allow permanent fusion?

Description: Super Saiyan was a legend among Saiyans - a warrior of incredible power appearing once every thousand years. Goku achieved it through intense emotion when Frieza killed Krillin.
Question: What is the legendary transformation of the Saiyan race?

Description: Goku was the first to achieve Super Saiyan in the present timeline, doing so on Namek during his battle with Frieza. The original Super Saiyan lived 1,000 years prior.
Question: Who was the first to achieve Super Saiyan in the series?

Description: Great Ape (Oozaru) transformation occurs when a Saiyan with a tail looks at a full moon (or artificial moonlight). Power multiplies 10x, but most Saiyans lose control.
Question: What transformation happens when a Saiyan looks at a full moon?

Description: Super Saiyan is characterized by golden hair (standing up), teal/green eyes, and a golden aura. The transformation increases power by approximately 50 times base level.
Question: What color does a Super Saiyan's hair turn?

Description: Kaio-ken multiplies the user's power, speed, and senses. The base form is 2x, but Goku pushed it to 20x against Frieza. It strains the body severely at higher levels.
Question: What is the multiplier of the base Kaio-ken technique?

Description: Gohan achieved Super Saiyan 2 during the Cell Games when Android 16 was destroyed. The form features more angular hair, lightning in the aura, and a tremendous power boost.
Question: Who achieved Super Saiyan 2 first?

Description: Gohan's anger at Cell for killing Android 16 and threatening his friends triggered Super Saiyan 2. This transformation is considered his peak power in Z.
Question: Against which villain did Gohan first become Super Saiyan 2?

Description: Super Saiyan 3 features extremely long golden hair reaching the back, pronounced brow ridges, and no eyebrows. It's extremely powerful but drains energy rapidly.
Question: What is unique about Super Saiyan 3's appearance?

Description: Planet Namek is the home of Piccolo's race, the Namekians. The Z Fighters traveled there to use its Dragon Balls to resurrect friends killed by the Saiyans.
Question: What planet do the Z Fighters travel to during the Frieza Saga?

Description: The Cell Games was Cell's tournament held 10 days after he achieved Perfect Form. He built an arena and challenged Earth's fighters, planning to destroy Earth if he won.
Question: What tournament does Cell host?

Description: Future Trunks killed Mecha Frieza and King Cold when they invaded Earth. This demonstrated his incredible power and revealed the existence of a time machine and alternate future.
Question: Who kills Frieza on Earth?

Description: Future Trunks comes from approximately 17-20 years in the future (the timeline varies by source). In his timeline, most Z Fighters were killed by the Androids.
Question: How many years in the future does Trunks come from?

Description: Gohan defeated Cell with a Father-Son Kamehameha, guided by Goku's spirit. Vegeta's distraction blast gave Gohan the opening to overpower Cell's Kamehameha.
Question: Who finally defeats Cell?

Description: Goku defeated Kid Buu with a Super Spirit Bomb powered by Earth's population, convinced by Mr. Satan to share their energy. This required Vegeta to stall Kid Buu.
Question: Who defeats Kid Buu?

Description: Vegito is the Potara fusion of Goku and Vegeta. The name combines 'Vegeta' and 'Kakarot.' Vegito is considered one of the most powerful beings in the universe.
Question: What is the name of the fusion between Goku and Vegeta using the Potara?

Description: Gogeta is the Fusion Dance result of Goku and Vegeta. Unlike Vegito (Potara), Gogeta only lasts 30 minutes. The name combines 'Goku' and 'Vegeta.'
Question: What is the name of the fusion between Goku and Vegeta using the Fusion Dance?

Description: There are 7 Dragon Balls in each set (Earth's, Namek's, etc.). Collecting all 7 and saying the proper phrase summons the eternal dragon to grant wishes.
Question: How many Dragon Balls are there?

Description: Shenron (Shen Long, meaning 'Divine Dragon') is Earth's dragon. Originally he could grant one wish, but Dende upgraded him to grant two (or three later).
Question: What is the name of the dragon summoned by Earth's Dragon Balls?

Description: Porunga is Namek's eternal dragon, larger and more muscular than Shenron. His name means 'God of Dreams' in Namekian. He can grant three wishes per summoning.
Question: What is the name of the dragon summoned by Namek's Dragon Balls?

Description: Porunga grants 3 wishes compared to Shenron's 1-2. However, Porunga's wishes have limitations - for instance, he could only resurrect one person per wish initially.
Question: How many wishes can Porunga grant?

Description: Kami created Earth's original Dragon Balls. As a Namekian, he had the ability to create Dragon Balls, which is tied to his life force - if the creator dies, the balls become inert.
Question: Who originally created Earth's Dragon Balls?

Description: Shenron cannot grant wishes beyond the power of his creator (Kami, then Dende). He cannot kill beings stronger than his creator or grant power beyond their abilities.
Question: What is the one wish Shenron cannot grant?
Answers: Killing someone stronger than its creator

Description: Akira Toriyama (1955-2024) created Dragon Ball in 1984. The manga ran in Weekly Sh≈çnen Jump, becoming one of the most influential and best-selling manga of all time.
Question: Who created Dragon Ball?

Description: Dragon Ball Z first aired in Japan on April 26, 1989. It continued the Dragon Ball story, focusing on Goku as an adult. It ran until January 31, 1996.
Question: What year did Dragon Ball Z first air?
RegExDescription: Accepts 1989 in numeric or word form

Description: Dragon Ball Z has 291 episodes in the original Japanese broadcast. This includes filler episodes created while the manga caught up. DBZ Kai removed most filler.
Question: How many episodes are in Dragon Ball Z?
RegExDescription: Accepts 291 in numeric or word form

Description: Toei Animation has produced all Dragon Ball anime since 1986. They're one of Japan's largest animation studios, also known for One Piece, Sailor Moon, and Digimon.
Question: What studio animated Dragon Ball Z?

Description: Dragon Ball Z Kai (DBZ Kai) is a remastered version of DBZ with filler content removed, new voice recording, and improved picture quality. It has 159 episodes (or 167 uncut).
Question: What is 'DBZ Kai'?
Answers: A remastered version with filler removed

Description: The 'Z' in Dragon Ball Z is debated. Toriyama stated it represents 'the end' (as Z is the last letter). 'Zenkai' (full power/recovery) is a popular fan theory but unconfirmed.
Question: What does the 'Z' in Dragon Ball Z stand for?

Description: Shin is the Supreme Kai of Universe 7, responsible for creation while the God of Destruction (Beerus) handles destruction. He's one of the few surviving Supreme Kais after Buu's rampage.
Question: Who is the Supreme Kai of Universe 7?

Description: Pan is Gohan and Videl's daughter, making her 1/4 Saiyan. She appears as a baby at the end of Z and as a young girl in GT. She's named after the Greek god Pan.
Question: What is the name of Gohan's daughter?

Description: Videl is Mr. Satan's daughter and a skilled martial artist. She learned to fly from Gohan and eventually married him. Her name is an anagram of 'Devil' (matching her father's demon theme).
Question: Who does Gohan marry?

Description: Mr. Satan (Hercule in some dubs) is the World Martial Arts Champion. He takes credit for defeating Cell, but he's actually a hero who befriends Buu and saves Earth during the Kid Buu fight.
Question: Who is Mr. Satan?

Description: Mr. Satan was renamed 'Hercule' in some dubs due to concerns about the 'Satan' name in Western markets. His original name fits the demon/devil naming theme of his family.
Question: What is Mr. Satan's real name in some dubs?

Description: Nappa was Vegeta's Saiyan partner, a bald elite warrior who was killed by Vegeta himself for losing to Goku. Despite being elite-class, he was far weaker than Vegeta.
Question: What was the name of Vegeta's bald Saiyan partner who he killed for being defeated?

Description: Majin Vegeta was created when Vegeta allowed Babidi to control him with dark magic, gaining a significant power boost. The 'M' mark appeared on his forehead.
Question: What mark appears on Vegeta's forehead when he becomes Majin Vegeta?

Description: The Final Explosion is Vegeta's ultimate self-destruction technique. He used it against Majin Buu, sacrificing his life in an attempt to destroy the monster.
Question: What is the name of Vegeta's self-destruction attack used against Buu?

Description: Super Saiyan Grade 3 (Ultra Super Saiyan/Super Saiyan Third Grade) maximizes muscle mass for power but sacrifices speed. Trunks used it against Perfect Cell but couldn't land hits.
Question: What is the major weakness of the Super Saiyan Grade 3 form?
Answers: Dramatically reduced speed due to bulky muscles
IncorrectAnswers: Increased ki drain without power boost

Description: Goku's heart virus was from a contagious disease that only affected him in the future timeline. Trunks brought medicine from the future to save him in the main timeline.
Question: What disease nearly killed Goku during the Android Saga?

Description: Frieza has four transformation forms, but his final form is actually his true/base form. He transforms to suppress his power because his true form is too powerful to control.
Question: What is unique about Frieza's final form compared to his other forms?
Answers: It's his true/natural form, not a power-up
IncorrectAnswers: It's a fusion with his father

Description: Dabura was the King of the Demon Realm before being controlled by Babidi. He could turn people to stone by spitting on them and wielded a magic sword.
Question: What was Dabura's title before being controlled by Babidi?

Description: Goku achieved Super Saiyan 3 while training in the Other World after his death in the Cell Saga. The lack of a living body is theorized to have enabled him to push beyond normal limits.
Question: Where did Goku first achieve Super Saiyan 3?

Description: Piccolo developed the Special Beam Cannon over five years specifically to kill Goku. Ironically, he first used it to kill Raditz, with Goku sacrificing himself to hold Raditz still.
Question: How long did it take Piccolo to develop the Special Beam Cannon?

Description: Android 16 was modeled after Dr. Gero's son, who died as a Red Ribbon Army soldier. This is why Gero made 16 gentle and never activated him, despite being the strongest android.
Question: Who was Android 16 modeled after?

Description: The Hyperbolic Time Chamber (Room of Spirit and Time) allows one year of training inside while only one day passes outside. Only two people can enter at once for a maximum of 48 hours external time.
Question: What is the time ratio inside the Hyperbolic Time Chamber?

Description: Dende upgraded Earth's Dragon Balls to grant two wishes (later three). He also removed the limitation that prevented reviving people who died of natural causes.
Question: What improvement did Dende make to Earth's Dragon Balls?
Answers: Increased to two wishes per summoning
IncorrectAnswers: Made the dragon more powerful than Porunga

Description: Gine was Goku's mother, a gentle Saiyan who worked as a meat processor rather than a warrior. She was introduced in 'Dragon Ball Minus' and the Broly movie.
Question: What is the name of Goku's mother?

Description: The Ginyu Force are Frieza's elite mercenary squad. In order of power: Guldo (weakest), Recoome, Burter, Jeice, and Captain Ginyu (strongest).
Question: Who is the leader of the Ginyu Force?

Description: Captain Ginyu's body change technique allows him to swap bodies with opponents. This backfired when he accidentally swapped into a frog's body and was stuck.
Question: What creature did Captain Ginyu accidentally swap bodies with?

Description: Imperfect Cell has a tail with a stinger used to absorb people, gaining their energy. He absorbed entire cities' populations to increase his power before finding the androids.
Question: How did Imperfect Cell absorb his victims?
Answers: Through the stinger on his tail

Description: Sean Schemmel voices adult Goku in the Funimation English dub. He's voiced Goku since 1999 and famously passed out while recording the Super Saiyan 4 transformation due to screaming.
Question: Who provides the English voice for adult Goku in the Funimation dub?

Description: Christopher Sabat voices Vegeta, Piccolo, and many other characters in the Funimation dub. He's also the ADR director for much of the Dragon Ball franchise.
Question: Which voice actor plays both Vegeta and Piccolo in the Funimation dub?

Description: Gotenks is the fusion of Goten and Trunks using the Fusion Dance. Despite being children, their fused form is incredibly powerful, able to achieve Super Saiyan 3.
Question: What is the fusion of Goten and Trunks called?

Description: Gotenks invented the Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack, creating ghost versions of himself that explode on contact. It's one of the most creative techniques in the series.
Question: What creative technique does Gotenks invent that creates explosive ghost copies?

Description: Super Buu absorbed multiple fighters: Gotenks, Piccolo, Gohan, and briefly Vegito (who escaped). Each absorption changed his appearance and personality.
Question: Which Z Fighter did Super Buu NOT absorb during the Buu Saga?

Description: Ultimate Gohan (Mystic Gohan) is Gohan's form after Old Kai unlocked his potential. It's not a Super Saiyan transformation but rather his base form with all latent power released.
Question: What ritual unlocked Gohan's Ultimate form?

Description: Yajirobe is a cowardly samurai who cut off Vegeta's tail during the Saiyan Saga, saving Goku's life. He lives at Korin Tower and is known for eating too much.
Question: Who cut off Vegeta's tail during the Saiyan Saga?

Description: King Kai taught Goku the Kaio-ken and Spirit Bomb on his small planet with 10x Earth's gravity. Goku trained there after his death fighting Raditz.
Question: Who taught Goku the Spirit Bomb and Kaio-ken?

Description: Goku used the Warp Kamehameha to defeat Perfect Cell's torso from close range. He combined Instant Transmission with the Kamehameha to teleport right next to Cell before firing.
Question: What technique did Goku use to destroy Cell's upper body at point-blank range?

Description: Cell regenerated from a single cell in his head containing a nucleus. As long as that nucleus remained, he could regenerate from any damage, similar to Piccolo's regeneration.
Question: What part of Cell's body must be destroyed to prevent regeneration?

Description: When Dragon Balls are used, they turn to stone and scatter across the world. They take one year to recharge and become usable again (Namekian Dragon Balls take 130 days).
Question: How long do Earth's Dragon Balls take to recharge after being used?

Description: Nail was the strongest Namekian warrior on Planet Namek. He fused with Piccolo to increase Piccolo's power dramatically before the fight with Frieza.
Question: Which Namekian warrior fused with Piccolo on Planet Namek?

Description: Tien used his Neo Tri-Beam repeatedly against Semi-Perfect Cell, sacrificing his life force to buy time for the androids to escape. It couldn't hurt Cell but pinned him down.
Question: What technique did Tien repeatedly use to stall Semi-Perfect Cell?

Description: The Solar Flare (Taiyoken) creates a blinding flash of light. It was originally Tien's technique but Goku, Krillin, and Cell have all used it at various times.
Question: What technique creates a blinding flash of light to blind opponents?

Description: Masako Nozawa voices Goku, Gohan, Goten, and other related characters in the Japanese version. She has voiced Goku since the original Dragon Ball in 1986.
Question: Who provides the Japanese voice for Goku, Gohan, and Goten?

Description: Cooler is Frieza's older brother, appearing in two DBZ movies. Unlike Frieza, Cooler has a fifth transformation form that he developed through training.
Question: What is the relationship between Cooler and Frieza?

Description: Korin is the cat god who lives atop Korin Tower. He grows Senzu Beans and originally trained fighters. Goku climbed his tower as a child to become stronger.
Question: Which character grows the Senzu Beans?

Description: Vegeta achieved Super Saiyan for the first time while training alone in space. His breakthrough came from intense rage and pushing himself beyond his limits.
Question: Where was Vegeta when he first achieved Super Saiyan?

Description: Vegeta's Galick Gun was first used against Goku during the Saiyan Saga. The two attacks clashed in a beam struggle that Goku eventually won using Kaio-ken x4.
Question: What multiplier of Kaio-ken did Goku use to overpower Vegeta's Galick Gun?
